mapper.select: SELECT V300.TYPE as type, V300.INT_RISK_PERIOD as intRiskPeriod, V300.AMOUNT as amount, V300.AMOUNT_LAST_CNY as amountLast, V300.SORT as sort FROM wp_v300 V300 WHERE 1 = 1 AND V300.STATUS = 'Y' AND V300.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V300.PERIOD = #{period}
SELECT DISTINCT V300.INT_RISK_PERIOD as intRiskPeriod FROM wp_v300 V300 WHERE 1 = 1 AND V300.STATUS = 'Y' AND V300.FUND_ID = #{fundId} AND V300.PERIOD = #{period} ORDER BY V300.SORT
